title: The Ultimate Move-Out Cleaning Checklist
excerpt: Don't lose your deposit! Here's everything your landlord checks during the final walkthrough.
content:
# The Ultimate Move-Out Cleaning Checklist

Moving out can be stressful, but getting your security deposit back shouldn't be. Here is the comprehensive checklist we use at ReadyCleans...

## The Kitchen
- Oven interior/exterior
- Refrigerator detailed
- Cabinets inside and out

## The Bathroom
- Grout scrubbing
- Shower glass descaling

author: Sarah Jenkins
